project-intro_key2: Yahan hun apne project ke baare mein ache se samjhenge ki hum kya bana rahe hain.
project-intro_key4: Upar waali video mein maine ache se explain kia hai ki hum kya `applications` bana rahe hain.
project-intro_key5: Isko aur ache se samajhne ke liye aap
project-intro_key7: pe jaake ek baar uss website ko ache se dekh sakte hain. IMDB se hum
project-intro_key9: ki list to scrape karenge. Uske baad hum movies ki details ko analyse karenge. Iss list ko aap
project-intro_key12: Iss project hum yeh sab tasks karenge:
project-intro_key13: **Top 250 Indian Movies** waali list mein se saari movies ki detail apne `python` ke `code` mein nikalenge.
project-intro_key14: Movies ko unki **release date ke hisaab se** group karenge.
project-intro_key15: Movies ko **decade of release ke hisaab se** group karenge. Jaise saari 1960s ki movies ek saath print karenge, 1970s ki alag se etc.
project-intro_key16: Movies ko unke **Directors** aur **Actors** ke hisaab se group karenge.
project-intro_key17: Yeh dekhenge ki kaunse kaunse actors ek dusre ke saath zyada kaam karte hain. Kya `Rajesh Khanna` aur `Ami`tab`h Bachan` ki ek saaath zyada movies hain ya `Rajesh Khanna` aur `Dev Anand`.
project-intro_key18: Aur bhi bahot saari interesting tasks karenge. Aap apne aap bhi bahot saari interesting cheezein soch sakte ho.
